评论概述: Legit wallet, conversation piece, no more numb legs when driving
评论详情: It was a must that I purchased a new wallet and I wanted something sling to keep in my back pack with no leg pains. This is it. Gus and gals like me and maybe not like me will love this wallet. it's practical, slim, carries exactly what you need in like, cash, I'd, debit cards, credit cards, membership cards, medical cars, AAA card etc.  It's when I pull it out and shock the surrounding eyeballs thst I have such a tiny wallet packed with so much $$ that it blows people away.  I literally still panic (had it for a short time) because I don't immediately feel a big bulge in my back pocket or front pocket. it's the best ever and I'm super proud thst i haven't lost it yet. I plan to get it engraved with my name to make the legitimacy real.  I am an official wood head.  Love this wallet!  Pros - design,cost, capacity, look, capacity feel,smell, capacity, front pocket, no problem,back pocket, no problem, money clip, no problem.  Cons -  It's tiny so I barely notice it, but maybe thieves feel the same way.  Minor scratches but that's all on me.
